name: createChainedFunction
description:
Safe chained functions

Will only create a new function if needed,
otherwise will pass back existing functions or null.

Forked from: https://github.com/react-bootstrap/react-overlays/blob/master/src/utils/createChainedFunction.js

params.name: funcs
params.description: Functions to chain. It can be null/undefined

returns.description: the functions chained after each other

title: createChainedFunction
